definition[0]: to discover whether something is correct or true
example[0]: American forces will remain to verify compliance with the treaty.
example[1]: A computer program verifies that the system is working.
explanation[0]: In everyday English, people usually say check rather than verify:
example[2]: Can I just check that I have spelt your name correctly.
definition[1]: to state that something is true
example[3]: His statement was verified by several witnesses.
